name: Ugly Albert
description:
relive a bullied mans flashback(brackeys game jam 2020.2)

AD space: controls

*note* 3rd game

I teamed up with my good friend https://davvven.itch.io/ to create a game for the brackeys gamejam. however, on tuesday morning there was a blackout and we lost 4 days of work, so if it looks rushed, it's because it is.
